div1.p: In the Circuit Court of the United States for the Western District of Washington
In the Matter of the Application of Columbia George for a writ of Habeas Corpus
Filed in the U.S. Circuit Court. Western Dist. of Washington
United States Circuit Court Western District of Washington Northern Division
In the Matter of the Application of Columbia George for a Writ of Habeas Corpus. No. 1390 Order

On this 24th day of February, A.D. 1906, on reading and filing the petition and motion for a writ of habeas corpus, it is hereby ordered that C.B. Hopkins, U.S. Marshal, do appear before this court on the 26 day of March, 1906, and show cause, if any there be, why the writ of habeas corpus prayed for should not be issued.
Service of the above order acquited this 24 day of Feb. 1906
